Utilities

Utilities can override certain CSS properties, like helper classes.

Current utilities

Below you can find the utilities which are currently in use. You can add your own utilities as long as they are most of the time include one CSS property.

.u-display-none

.u-visibility-hidden

.u-text-align-left

.u-text-align-right

.u-text-align-center

.u-float-left

.u-float-right

.u-spacing

.u-line-through
